quick_answer.text: A standard Fireball shot contains about 110 calories, primarily from alcohol and added sugars.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a fireball shot?
faqs.a: Approximately 110 calories for a standard 1.5 fl oz shot.

faqs.q: Does a fireball shot have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 11 g carbs and 11 g sugars per shot from the cinnamon flavoring.

faqs.q: How much alcohol is in a fireball shot?
faqs.a: A 1.5 fl oz shot contains about 13.2 ml of pure alcohol at 33% ABV.

faqs.q: Are there any fats or proteins in fireball?
faqs.a: No fats or proteins; calories come mainly from alcohol and carbs.
